name: Syslog Log Monitoring - Monitor Logs

screenshots.caption: Monitoring logs - Specify patterns to Monitor in Logs
Log Monitoring - Monitor Multiple Patterns in Log File

short_description:
Monitoring Logs, Alerting on Log files - Log Analysis Software - Use one tool to comb through your logs.  Scan syslog log files in time frames. Monitor all UNIX logs.  Graph & Analyze!

Log monitoring is a mandatory task for any UNIX engineer.  Through log monitoring, users can investigate application, network, system problems.  Through log monitoring, users can trend the behavior of their applications and systems and easily identify when abnormal events start to occur.  

Log Monitoring saves system administrators a lot of headache.  The quicker one is to get to the root of a problem, the easier it is to find the solution. Log monitoring helps in a variety of ways.  It is important you take it seriously.

With logrobot, users can set up monitoring for their logs without having to read a ton of documentation.  With logrobot, you can begin monitoring and alerting on your logs within 5 minutes of downloading the tool.

Log Monitoring affects every day life.  Simplify your work.
summary: monitor syslog logs, analyze log entries hourly/minutely
